title: Photograph, View of the chancel facing the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the chancel facing the altar of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Horizontal rectangle: View of the altar, reredos and pulpit, showing the lower section of the chancel. Eight single columns of marble make nine pointed arches in a semi-circular detached arcade; clustered columns far left and right. Communion rail of metalwork, with flowers. Altar of Gothic revival. A wooden pulpit with an angel supporting the lectern.

Same church as 1961-83-2.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the chancel facing the altar of an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-3
